title: The Essence of Intelligence
author: VD
content_html:
A long discussion of IQ and the implications of its characteristics that may be of interest to some readers here.

My contribution to the discussion is definitional: Intelligence is the ability to reach correct conclusions on the basis of the available information. The fewer the data points and the less time required, the higher the intelligence.

DISCUSS ON SG
